title: of the Institutional Burials Act 2022 (No. 18 of 2022), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Institutional Burials Act 2022 (Extension
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Institutional Burials Act 2022 (Extension 
of period of operation of Office of Director of Authorised Intervention, Tuam) 
Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited institutional burial act 2022 (extension period operation office director authorised intervention tuam) order 2024

title: of the Institutional Burials Act 2022 (No. 18 of 2022), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The Office of the Director of Authorised Intervention established under
text_raw:
2. The Office of the Director of Authorised Intervention established under 
the Institutional Burials Act 2022 (Establishment of Office of Director of 
Authorised Intervention, Tuam) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 87 of 2023) shall continue 
in operation until the 30th day of June 2027. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

7 November, 2024. 

RODERIC O'GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 12th November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [625] 3
